name: ProductCatalogTemplate
comment: This entity holds the templates defined for product catalog items (i.e. Product Offering Types and Product Specification Types).
vf short description: This entity holds the templates defined for product catalog items (i.e. Product Offering Types and Product Specification Types).

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the product catalog template in ALDM. Each product catalog template key value represents a unique product specification type or product offering type. //C1 D1: Generated Key on Product Catalog Template Id and Product Catalog Template Ind

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateDesc
fields.comment: Describes the product catalog template. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.description or  productSpecType.description

fields.name: ParentCatalogTemplateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateId
fields.comment: Identifies the product catalog template in the source system. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.id or  productSpecType.id

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateInd
fields.comment: Indicates the product catalog template type whether it is Product Offering Type or Product Specification Type. //C1 D1: If source is productOfferingType then PO else if source is productSpecType then PS

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateName
fields.comment: Indicates the product catalog template name. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.name or  productSpecType.name

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateGroupDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the product catalog template group description. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.typeGroup or  productSpecType.typeGroup

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateOfferClassification
fields.comment: Indicates the offer classification for this product catalog template. Relevant only for product offering type. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.offerClassification

fields.name: LimitedDurationOptionFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if this product catalog template is available for a limited duration. Relevant only for product offering type. //C1 D1: If productOfferingType.limitedDurationOption is true then 1 else 0

fields.name: BundleFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if this product catalog template is a bundle. Relevant only for product offering type. //C1 D1: If productOfferingType.isBundle is true then 1 else 0

fields.name: ProductCatalogTemplateVariantInd
fields.comment: Indicates the variant grouping for this product catalog template. //C1 D1: productOfferingType.variantsGrouping

fields.name: ExpiredForSaleFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if this product catalog template is expired for sale. //C1 D1: If productOfferingType.expiredForSales is true then 1 else 0 or If productSpecType.expiredForSales is true then 1 else 0

fields.name: SerializedFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the product catalog template is serialized: 1 means an instance represents a single instance of product and 0 means a single instance represents bulk quantity of product. //C1 D1: If productSpecType.serialized is true then 1 else 0

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
